title: Bu Yiyang De Tuzi Shizi Pian
synopsis: This animation is to prepare children for elementary school and reading picture books. With reference to the "Frequency Statistics of Commonly Used Modern Chinese Characters" compiled by the National Language Work Committee, mainstream children’s picture books, primary school textbooks and textbooks and supplementary textbooks for high-frequency words, about 800 words were selected as the teaching content. After school, children will not have problems with reading and understanding questions, and can effectively self-read picture books. Each episode teaches about 20 characters, 10 of which are key characters, and will be taught in a variety of ways. Each episode contains at least one theme of "good habits, good behavior" education, covering the five main abilities of emotional intelligence: the ability to understand your own emotions, the ability to control your own emotions, the ability to motivate yourself, and the ability to understand other people's emotions. Ability and the ability to maintain harmonious interpersonal relationships. For example, in the 40th episode of "House Full of Love", while teaching Chinese characters, it focuses on educating children to forgive others, be tolerant, and know how to cherish the friendship between friends. They must be rewarded for nothing; helping them is truly caring. (translated from youku)
